data.message: Eminem you know I’m a big fan and would buy everything but I got stalked and beaten up 3 times 5 years ago... all my pics are recent 👍I’m not fucked up🙏🙏🙏thank god 💋but my medical bills are crazy expensive... when I can I’ll buy everything that’s a promise ♥️♥️♥️keep speaking truth for people like me and you... I’m a model/ actress and the first photo shoot I did after I recovered was to your music 🎶 drop the world 🌎♥️♥️♥️playing in the background dedicated to you and lil Wayne.... it got over 3 million views. Blessings and love Eminem and to your daughter.
